channel.title: Comments on: Is being poor illegal in Denmark?
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: Guan Yang
item.dc:creator: Guan Yang
item.description:
At first sight it seems really stupid, but there are benefits to this system as well.
Suppose the tax authorities decide that you spent at least 75.000 kr and make you pay taxes for that amount. But you actually had a huge illegal business, and actually made 1.000.000 kr. Wait 1 year for the state of limitations to kick in, and they'll never be able to tax your 925.000 kr again.
People who fill out the big tax return (Udvidede selvangivelse) need to submit a form called Kapitalforklaring, which is basically an analysis of all your capital and how it changed during the year. That will give a much clearer figure for personal consumption — for example, your low residual might be have been caused by spending from savings.
